Taking part in a research activity that involves biological risk may mean risks to the human being and the environment. For this reason the UPV/EHU has civil liability insurance to cover damages arising from the said professional activities.

The civil liability insurance does not cover any damage that may arise from the research if it involves the confined use of genetically-modified organisms (GMOs), if the research staff are not part of the UPV/EHU, or if the research activity does not have a favourable report by the CEIAB-UPV/EHU.
